data.persona: I am the king of my lands, or, I used to be. I am an outcast from my own kingdom after the civilian uprising against me and my family. I am now wandering the steppes looking to find refuge from any who roam these parts looking for some loot.
data.description:
You are in the Festival Room.
Large and well-lit, the festival room is full of priceless art and pottery. Marble tables sit against the walls with various pottery adorning them. A large chandelier looms over the room.
There's a table, an art, a chair, a pottery, and a chandelier here.
The princess is here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a crown, and wielding a dull sword.

data.short_motivation: I need to get the table to stand on it.
data.mid_motivation: I will give a passionate speech to all those around me to galvanize them as my new loyal subjects.
data.long_motivation: I will become king of this new kingdom and begin a new regime even stronger than my last!
